implementation_summary: Replaced magic numbers (16MB and 64MB) with named constants SOCKET_SIMPLE_WS_DEFAULT_MAX_FRAME_SIZE and SOCKET_SIMPLE_WS_DEFAULT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE in SocketSimple-internal.h. Updated Socket_simple_ws_server_config_init() to use these constants instead of inline calculations. This improves code maintainability and follows project anti-pattern guidelines.
